tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We recently changed our Paediatrician seeing the way he behaved. My kid Dharun, aged 2 years was having fever and running cold. When I contacted that doctor, he said if it was vaccination, he was available, but for this, only video consultation was possible!!! I felt really disappointed in his attitude. Then, I searched in Practo and luckily came across Dr.Priya. She gave an appointment immediately. She was very courteous and was trying her best to pacify my kid who got grumpy getting into the clinic :-)Recently, I took him for vaccination. Infact, she went one step ahead and adviced us that Meningococcal vaccine is not required for our kid and Flu Booster should be fine. She shared couple of articles as well. The other doctor was insisting us to take the Meningococcal vaccine prior to the Flu Booster. Anyway, Dr.Priya proved she was a better and more importantly an ethical doctor even if the other doctor had more experience than her. I don't want to name that doctor. But I definitely wanted to  do a compare!!!Me and my wife felt, Dr.Priya is a compassionate doctor whom we can trust and definitely travel a long distance for consultation.Thanks Dr.Priya. Please stay rooted and please keep up this humaneness. More parents will keep coming to you. Really happy we found you for our Dharun!!!With Lots of Thanks,Karunakaran

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Been consulting Dr.Priya since my pregnancy. I consult her for every single and silly thing - when my baby didn't sleep and when he slept for a long time, when he had loose motion and when he had constipation, when a chair fell on him and when he fell down on the floor, for cold, cough and even when I missed the vaccination by one day. Being a new mother is a difficult phase for everyone and Dr.Priya helped me through it and never once got irked with all my silly doubts.  

Best part about the doctor is, she will connect with the kids instantly and mine always felt comfortable with her. Would definitely recommend her to everyone especially for infants and toddlers.

tags: None
review:
A down to earth person with great ethics.
I was surprised to see such a young doctor with so much patience, she listened to all my complaints without any hurry or hesitation and gave us the best treatment protocol of which my son is completely alright now and totally satisfied with her attention..
She gives genuine opinion to all the parents..

Good Doctor always understands their responsibility & being accountable to the family members better than privilege

More than a good doctor, I value the fact that you were a good listener which is very more important dealing kids and their parents. Thanks for being one such Doctor..

All d best doc..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This Vaccination for our toddler was surprisingly a very smooth experience, all thanks to Dr.Priya.We were worried if the kid would be restless all day etc (esp from past experiences) but it turned out very smooth. Doctor took extra care in fetching details from us before hand about brand information for the vaccine and also detailed us very well on post vaccination care.Doctor explained us in detail about Government Vacc. policy changes on schedule too.The consulting session helped us understand some very fine aspects about our child.Thanks to Dr.Priya and certainly recommend to all parents.

tags: None
review: My experience with Dr.Priya is that she has a very kind & friendly approach with her patients. She really tries & understands the problem/case to the root & comes out with appropriate solutions ! would definitely recommend her to my family & friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *************** *** *** ****** Had a very detailed consultation and answered all our queries very patiently.. She was also very friendly and she helped us with more additional information for the baby's health.. I would strongly recommend without any hesitation. Best Doctor to look out for Kids..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Visited Dr Priya for my daughter's vaccination. Reached out to her on WhatsApp and she patiently responded to all my queries and doubts. When we visited her, the first thing she did was to get my daughter comfortable. Though it was a visit just to get vaccines, she cleared all my other doubts as well and was very approachable and friendly. Would certainly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: If someone is searching for the safest hands to treat your baby, "Dr. Priyatharani" is your best bet. My baby was given the utmost care and treated at the best possible way. Doc listened to all our concerns in a very kind way and gave the best advise to it. Spent quality time in understanding the baby like a family member does, which I have never experienced before. Very Humble and Highly Proficient Doctor...! Thank you Practo for gifting us with the best Doc in town..!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor Priyatharini was very friendly and patient in answering all my queries with patience and in detail..She even gave tips on various details that are necessary for infant care.. The consultation was for almost 45 minutes and it was worth the time and money.. 

I would  definitely recommend her to anyone looking for pediatric consultation..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Child specialists ,Nutritional,Children's Health,Paediatric care,Child nutrition Guidance,
review: I visited for my 7months old baby for a Nutritional guidance and Paediatric care. Dr. Priyatharini explained it well. Dr explained all things and cleared all our doubts. Not only for a general paediatric things but for all necessary care. I strongly recommend Dr. Priyatharini since she is more dedicated not only for her professional way but also the way she taken the time and extra care to the baby for healthy living.

review:
Dr Priyatharini is a kids friendly doctor.  We visited her for my daughter who was suffering from frequent stomach ache. She carefully analysed and diagnosed it to be amoebiasis  and suggested her medicines. She also advised us to take precautionary measures and clearly explained so that even my daughter who is 10 years old can understand. My daughter is perfectly alright now. 

I would definitely recommend her to my family and other friends too.
